item.title: [PI] Kalphite queen doesnt respawn
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Just because it has a respawn timer, doesn’t necessarily mean that it will respawn.

One thing I would do is find where the respawn timer variable is used, and then alert based on the conditions. Then when it doesn’t alert when it should, you know the condition that isn’t being met.

Read full topic
